/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

On either side of the street, there are lush green trees and grass, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The street itself is lined with power lines, a common sight in many cities. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day.

In the background, there's a body of water, possibly a lake or a pond, adding a calming element to the bustling cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements.
